definition: to point a brick wall/to grout a tiled surface
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook

sentences.english: In addition, attention should also be checked in a timely manner after the brick paving joint.
sentences.chinese: 另外，磚鋪貼之後還應注意及時勾縫。

sentences.english: Cement pointing is harder than soft brick or stone.
sentences.chinese: 在混凝土上勾縫比在軟性磚或石頭上更難。

sentences.english: Hang up to sew to mainly used for characteristic ceramic tile's hang up to sew the adornment.
sentences.chinese: 勾縫劑主要用於個性化的瓷磚勾縫裝飾。

sentences.english: Hang up to sew to mainly used for characteristic ceramic tile's hang up to sew the adornment.
sentences.chinese: 勾縫劑主要用於個性化的瓷磚勾縫裝飾。

sentences.english: Remove extra joint filler on the surface of tiles.
sentences.chinese: 勾縫後應用瓷磚表面多餘的嵌縫料擦拭乾淨。
